articles.title: Obesity in India: How 'pot belly' went from status symbol to silent killer - BBC
articles.description: India’s obesity crisis is surging - and the humble pot belly may be a bigger villain than it seems.
articles.content:
The Indian pot belly - once a badge of prosperity, indulgence and aging respectability - has long been a target of satire and social commentary.
In literature, it quietly signalled comfort or compla… [+6171 chars]
